meanings.definition: A person who takes notes or records information.
meanings.sent1: The notators in the meeting wrote down all the important points.
meanings.sent2: I always rely on notators to keep track of my thoughts and ideas.
meanings.sent3: The notators at the lecture were so focused, they didn't even notice the funny typo on the screen.
meanings.sent4: Her memory was like a group of diligent notators, capturing every detail effortlessly.
meanings.sent5: The notators in the library were like silent scribes, documenting the knowledge of the ages.

meanings.definition: A software or tool used for taking notes or recording information.
meanings.sent1: I downloaded a new notators app to help me stay organized.
meanings.sent2: The notators on my computer make it easy to jot down quick reminders.
meanings.sent3: The notators program saved me so much time, I had a moment to grab a snack!
meanings.sent4: The notators tool was like a digital assistant, keeping track of everything for me.
meanings.sent5: With the notators software, my productivity soared as I effortlessly kept track of all my tasks.
